mapper.select: SELECT pick_no pickNo, customer_code customerCode, bar_code barCode, SUM( numbers ) bayNums, store_code storeCode, available_nums availableNums, single_unit single FROM v_wms_invoice WHERE pick_no = #{pickNo} AND bill_state != #{billState} AND house_code = #{houseCode} GROUP BY pick_no, customer_code, bar_code, store_code, available_nums

SELECT pick_no pickNo, mail_no mailNo, order_no orderNo, basket_num basketNum, orderCommodityId, bar_code barCode, numbers, pick_numbers pickNumbers, orderBillState, pickState FROM v_wms_invoice_check WHERE pick_no = #{pickNo} AND bar_code = #{barCode} ORDER BY pick_no, order_no, basket_num, orderCommodityId
SELECT pick_no pickNo, mail_no mailNo, order_no orderNo, basket_num basketNum, is_finish isFinish FROM wms_mail_picking_info WHERE pick_no = #{pickNo}

SELECT wmpi.pick_no pickNo, woc.order_no orderNo, woc.bar_code barCode, SUM( woc.numbers - woc.pick_numbers ) omitNum FROM wms_mail_picking_info wmpi LEFT JOIN wms_order_commodity woc ON wmpi.order_no = woc.order_no WHERE wmpi.is_finish = 0 AND wmpi.state = #{state} AND wmpi.pick_no = #{pickNo} GROUP BY wmpi.pick_no, woc.order_no, woc.bar_code
